name: C/C++
description: {C++} was my very first language. I started learning it myself in my free time in high school. All my intro programming classes at SCU taught {C}, so I was already familiar when I started.

name: JavaScript
description: {JavaScript} was my third language. I got interested in learning after looking at some open-source code. I learned it and started working on multiple projects including the [Canvas Module PDF Downloader](https://github.com/joshsj89/Canvas-Module-PDF-Downloader).

name: HTML/CSS
description: {HTML/CSS} was what I used to create [some web extensions](https://joshsj89.github.io/#projects) and design [this site](https://joshsj89.github.io/).

name: Python
description: I learned Python after already being very comfortable with C++. I learned it mainly through tutoring new programmers.

name: Git
description: I've used {Git} for almost all of [my projects](https://joshsj89.github.io/#projects), so I am very familiar with it.

name: Unity
description: My team and I used {Unity} to create [Polaris](https://polarisscu.itch.io/polaris).

name: Node.js
description: As I learned {JavaScript}, I utilized {Node.js} and its REPL.
